title: Smiling Face with Smiling Eyes and Three Hearts
description:
A yellow face with smiling eyes, a closed smile, rosy cheeks, and several hearts floating around its head. Expresses a range of happy, affectionate feelings, especially being in love. The placement of the hearts varies slightly by platform.

Apple's design features the same expression as its ‚ò∫Ô∏è Smiling Face emoji design.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the smiling face with hearts emoji radiates pure joy and adoration, depicted with a bright, rosy blush and eyes crinkled in happiness.  The surrounding hearts, rendered in a vibrant pink and red with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading, seem to float around the cheerful countenance, creating a sense of overwhelming affection. This emoji, with its soft rounded edges and realistic lighting, perfectly captures the feeling of being completely smitten or deeply appreciative in digital conversations.
